googlesheets.googlesheet module

class googlesheets.googlesheet.BookingDataBase(file_account, sheet_name: str)

Bases: object

add_booking(user_id, booking_start_date, booking_last_date, people_number, user_avito_name, user_contact)

Method for add booking on local copy of google docs. For accept changes (update remote booking table) must be call method update_remote_database()

Parameters:

  • user_id

  • booking_start_date

  • booking_last_date

  • people_number

  • user_avito_name

  • user_contact

Returns:
